FinScript
Table of Contents

Namespace FinScript.Rendering

Classes

BarStyleDisplayStateAttribute

For marking chart style as standard (which uses original bar series), non-standard or hidden

BarStyleExtensions

Extension methods for BarStyle

BarStyleExtensions.BarStyleModeDescriptor
BarStyleModeEnumAttribute

Many of chart types has "modes" - and this attribute attaches enum of modes to chart type See for example CandlestickBarStyleMode

BarStyleRequirementsAttribute

Some chart styles has some requirements - f.e. Cluster Chart requires broker to support MarketDataProvider and TimeAndSalesProvider. This attribute allows to attach collection of requirements to chart style. BarStyleRequirements

ChartAnnotationContainer

Helper class to put together all chart interaction functionality in one place for further reusing in different script units

EnablesClusterChartModeAttribute

Chart Modes marked with this attribute will activate "Enable Cluster Chart" checkbox when selected. ClusterChartBarStyleMode describes what figure (candle/bar/box) to draw and where to print text relative to this figure

SimpleVisualIndicatorOnBars

A visual indicator based on a series as Input which supports only one plot Plot, Result

SimpleVisualIndicatorOnSeries

A visual indicator based on a series as Input which supports only one plot Plot, Result

UsedPricesAttribute

Defines what prices of the bar are used for drawing

VisualIndicatorOnBars

Indicator based on IBarSeries input data

VisualIndicatorOnNone

Indicator which does not require any input data

VisualIndicatorOnSeries

Indicator based on ISeries<T> input data

VisualIndicator<TSeries>
VisualStrategy

Interfaces

IBarsTypeWithBarStyle

The IBarsType should support default bar style info, but since BarStyle is located in assembly not accessible for IBarsType, an extending interface is used

IColorizedPlot

Plot with palette, the color of each item can be customized. If color for specified item is not set, Stroke

BarStyle

Modes of drawing bars IBarSeries IBarsType DefaultBarStyle

BarStyleDisplayState
BarStyleRequirements

Requirements that needed to make chart style work

Modes for CandleBar

Modes for ClusterChart

Modes for HighLowBox

Modes for LineOnOhlc

Modes for Mountain

Modes for Ohlc
